comment.author: 18259771@N00
comment._content: why do you as a professional photo archive upload pictures in this ridiculously low resolution?

comment.author: 88664184@N00
comment._content: maybe the photo was small to begin with? I think the important thing is that it's shared.  For archival purposes, flickr isnt be best place to 'store' data, but hey, if more people see the images, I think it's done it's job at taking snapshots of history.

comment.author: 8798197@N04
comment._content: een woonoord is niet "a dutch town". woonoorden waren veelal voormalige concentratiekampen (westerbork, vught, amersfoort) die werden hergebruikt om molukse knil militairen en hun gezinnen te huisvesten.
